FOUND IN: Lady Godiva: An English noblewoman known for her legendary ride on horseback naked in 1042 A.D., although there is no historical evidence to support this story and the association with Leofric might be anachronistic or metapomedical interpretation.
Cher: An American actress, singer, and songwriter known for her role as Rose Castorini in the film "Moonstruck." She won the Academy Award for Best Actress in 1987 for this performance.
